message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for negotiations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations for a fair negotiation.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could come down slightly to $1,050,000. This reflects the true worth of the product.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort towards a compromise. Considering my financial situation, I would like to counterpropose a price of $1,000,000. I hope this suggestion can lead us closer to an agreement.
